references: regularly media se baat karte raho

justifications: But I have a life beyond films.
My time is very precious. And my mental state is very precious to me.
So I have started protecting myself in terms of who I expose my mind or myself to.
I have stopped running the race of being the most seen, the most viewed - the search for the superlative adjective, mera ab khatam ho gaya hai.
I have realised nothing is the 'most'.
I think I have much more control over my mind.
It's not as easy to trigger me now as it was probably at 17.
And I think a clarity of priorities has now come to me - it had in fact started coming to me as my 30s started.
